text: puokke ban niyeay tha ao nuo h. anak pitchea ban chhloh brakek cheamuoy puok yeung ning ban bangkochomloh cheamuoy puok yeung chraen dng mk haey . dau che neah chaur anak neamk aoy puok yeung nouv avei del anak ban sanyea cheamuoy puok yeung( tondakamm robsa a l laoh) brasenbae anak sthet knongchamnaom anak del troemotrauv men noh
